original_title: My Sight, Which Was My Power, Now Blurs
overview: The Continuation Of Attenuation Will Soon Lead To The Demise Of Not Only False Prophets But Also The Lies Which They Used As Retaliation Against Those Who Refused To Compromise And Imitate And Instead Chose To Weaponize Their Prolonged Periods Of Lamentation Which Their Prospective Captors Relied Upon Causing Suffocation Within Ones Own Grief, Sorrow And Regret.
title: My Sight, Which Was My Power, Now Blurs
